original_text: To offer burnt offerings unto the Lord upon the altar of the burnt offering continually morning and evening, and to do according to all that is written in the law of the Lord, which he commanded Israel;
korean_text: 항상 아침 저녁으로 번제단 위에 여호와께 번제를 드리되 여호와의 율법에 기록하여 이스라엘에게 명령하신 대로 다 준행하게 하였고

sentences.original_text: To offer burnt offerings unto the Lord
upon the altar of burnt offering
and to do according to all that is written
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기록된 모든 것에 따라 행하며

sentences.original_text: in the law of the Lord
